    ps_3_0
    def c3, 0, 1, 0.999000013, 0.5
    def c4, 2, -1, 1, 0.0625
    def c5, 9.99999975e-005, -0.999899983, 0.125, 0.699999988
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -I ../../.. --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 -f B0A96CCF.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s15
mov r11.xyw, v0
add r31.w, r11.w, -r31.y
mad r11.x, r31.w, r31.x, r11.x

    rcp r0.x, r11.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r11.xxyw
    mad r1.xy, r0.yzzw, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r1.zw, c3.x
    texldl r1, r1, s0
    mov r1.y, c3.y
    add r0.w, r1.y, -c2.y
    add r0.w, -r0.w, r1.w
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, -c2.x
    mul r0.yz, r0.w, r0
    mul r2, r0.z, c9

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -I ../../.. --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 -f B0A96CCF.txt
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.y, -r31.w, r31.x, r0.y

    mad r2, c8, r0.y, r2
    mad r2, c10, r0.w, r2
    add r2, r2, c11
    rcp r1.x, r2.w
    mul r1.zw, r1.x, r2.xyxy
    min r3.z, r2.z, c3.z
    mad r2.zw, r11.xyxy, r0.x, c3.y
    mul r2.zw, r2, c0.xyxy
    mul r2.zw, r2, c3.w
    texld r4, r2.zwzw, s2
    mad_pp r4, r4.yxyx, c4.x, c4.y
    mul_pp r5, r4.wzwz, c4.zyzy
    mad r6, r5.zwzw, c20.xxzz, r1.zwzw
    mad_pp r6, r4.zwzw, c20.yyww, r6
    mul r3.xyw, r6.xyzx, c3.yyzx
    texldl r7, r3, s1
    mul r3.xyw, r6.zwzx, c3.yyzx
    texldl r6, r3, s1
    add r7, -r7, r3.z
    cmp_pp r7, r7, c3.x, c3.y
    dp4_pp r0.x, r7, c4.w
    add r6, r3.z, -r6
    cmp_pp r6, r6, c3.x, c3.y
    dp4_pp r2.z, r6, c4.w
    add_pp r0.x, r0.x, r2.z
    mad r5, r5, c21.xxzz, r1.zwzw
    mad_pp r4, r4, c21.yyww, r5
    mov_pp r5.xy, r4
    mov r5.zw, r3
    texldl r6, r5, s1
    mov_pp r5.xy, r4.zwzw
    texldl r4, r5, s1
    add r6, r3.z, -r6
    cmp_pp r6, r6, c3.x, c3.y
    dp4_pp r1.z, r6, c4.w
    add_pp r0.x, r0.x, r1.z
    add r4, r3.z, -r4
    cmp_pp r4, r4, c3.x, c3.y
    dp4_pp r1.z, r4, c4.w
    add_pp r0.x, r0.x, r1.z
    add r1.z, -r0.x, c5.x
    add r1.w, r0.x, c5.y
    cmp r1.w, r1.w, c3.x, c3.y
    cmp r1.z, r1.z, c3.x, r1.w
    if_ne r1.z, -r1.z
      mad_pp r4, r2.xyxy, r1.x, c12
      mov_pp r5.xy, r4
      texldl r6, r5, s1
      mov_pp r5.xy, r4.zwzw
      texldl r7, r5, s1
      add r6, r3.z, -r6.wxyz
      add r7, r3.z, -r7.wxyz
      cmp_pp r6, r6, c3.x, c3.y
      cmp_pp r7, r7, c3.x, c3.y
      mul r4, r4, c22.xyxy
      frc_pp r4, r4
      mov_pp r8.xy, r6
      mov_pp r8.zw, r7.xyxy
      mov_pp r7.xy, r6.zwzw
      lrp_pp r6, r4.yyww, r7, r8
      mad_pp r7, r2.xyxy, r1.x, c13
      mov_pp r5.xy, r7
      texldl r8, r5, s1
      mov_pp r5.xy, r7.zwzw
      texldl r9, r5, s1
      add r8, r3.z, -r8.wxyz
      add r9, r3.z, -r9.wxyz
      cmp_pp r8, r8, c3.x, c3.y
      cmp_pp r9, r9, c3.x, c3.y
      mul r7, r7, c22.xyxy
      frc_pp r7, r7
      mov_pp r10.xy, r8
      mov_pp r10.zw, r9.xyxy
      mov_pp r9.xy, r8.zwzw
      lrp_pp r8, r7.yyww, r9, r10
      lrp_pp r9.xy, r4.xzzw, r6.ywzw, r6.xzzw
      lrp_pp r9.zw, r7.xyxz, r8.xyyw, r8.xyxz
      dp4_pp r1.z, r9, c5.z
      mad_pp r4, r2.xyxy, r1.x, c14
      mov_pp r5.xy, r4
      texldl r6, r5, s1
      mov_pp r5.xy, r4.zwzw
      texldl r7, r5, s1
      add r6, r3.z, -r6.wxyz
      add r7, r3.z, -r7.wxyz
      cmp_pp r6, r6, c3.x, c3.y
      cmp_pp r7, r7, c3.x, c3.y
      mul r4, r4, c22.xyxy
      frc_pp r4, r4
      mov_pp r8.xy, r6
      mov_pp r8.zw, r7.xyxy
      mov_pp r7.xy, r6.zwzw
      lrp_pp r6, r4.yyww, r7, r8
      mad_pp r2, r2.xyxy, r1.x, c15
      mov_pp r5.xy, r2
      texldl r7, r5, s1
      mov_pp r5.xy, r2.zwzw
      texldl r5, r5, s1
      add r7, r3.z, -r7.wxyz
      add r3, r3.z, -r5.wxyz
      cmp_pp r5, r7, c3.x, c3.y
      cmp_pp r3, r3, c3.x, c3.y
      mul r2, r2, c22.xyxy
      frc_pp r2, r2
      mov_pp r7.xy, r5
      mov_pp r7.zw, r3.xyxy
      mov_pp r3.xy, r5.zwzw
      lrp_pp r5, r2.yyww, r3, r7
      lrp_pp r3.xy, r4.xzzw, r6.ywzw, r6.xzzw
      lrp_pp r3.zw, r2.xyxz, r5.xyyw, r5.xyxz

      add_pp r1.x, r1.x, r1.z
      lrp_pp r2.x, c5.w, r1.x, r0.x
      mov_pp r0.x, r2.x
    endif
    mul r1.xzw, r0.z, c17.xyyz
    mad r1.xzw, c16.xyyz, r0.y, r1
    mad r0.yzw, c18.xxyz, r0.w, r1.xxzw
    add r0.yzw, r0, c19.xxyz
    add r0.yzw, -r0, c24.xxyz
    mul r0.yzw, r0, c24.w
    dp3 r0.y, r0.yzww, r0.yzww
    rsq r0.y, r0.y
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mad r0.y, r0.y, c25.y, c25.z
    max r1.x, r0.y, c3.x
    mad r0.y, r1.x, -r1.x, c3.y
    max r1.x, r0.y, c3.x
    pow_pp r0.y, r1.x, c25.x
    add r1, -r1.y, c23
    mad_pp r1, r0.y, r1, c3.y
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.x, r0.x
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r0.y
    add_pp r2, -r1, c3.y
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r2, r1

// approximately 164 instruction slots used (27 texture, 137 arithmetic)
